description: This is the table for transplanted organs that will be linked to the transplant table through a reference Id.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: TRANSPLANT_REFERENCE_IDENT
columns.description: This stores the unique reference id associated with the transplant episode that is a reference to the related group line DXR 11700

columns.name: TRANSPLANT_ORGAN_IDENT
columns.description: This stores the reference id generated by the organ ID linked to the episode.

columns.name: TRANSPLANTED_ORGAN_TYPE_ID
columns.description: Organ type for the transplanted organ.

columns.name: TRANSPLANT_DONOR_SOURCE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Transplanted organ's donor type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Living


Donation after Brain Death


Donation after Circulatory Death 


Auto

columns.name: TRANSPLANT_ORGAN_KDPI_SCORE
columns.description: Specifies the kidney donor's risk profile percentage. Associated with the received kidney

columns.name: TXP_ORGAN_COLD_ISCHC_TIME_1
columns.description: Organ cold ischemic time calculated based on number of minutes between clamp on to clamp off.

columns.name: TXP_ORGAN_COLD_ISCHC_TIME_2
columns.description: Organ cold ischemic time calculated based on number of minutes between clamp on to anastamosis.

columns.name: TXP_DONOR_SEROLOGY_CMV_C_NAME
columns.description:
Organ donor's CMV serology test result.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Positive


Negative


Not Done


Unknown/Cannot Disclose

columns.name: TXP_DONOR_SEROLOGY_EBV_C_NAME
columns.description:
Organ donor's EBV serology test result.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TXP_DONOR_SEROLOGY_CMV_C_NAME

columns.name: TXP_DONOR_SEROLOGY_HCV_C_NAME
columns.description:
Organ donor's HCV serology test result.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TXP_DONOR_SEROLOGY_CMV_C_NAME

columns.name: ORGAN_SINGLE_SOURCE_DXO_ID
columns.description: Source organization for transplanted organ info when the data is sourced from a single organization.

columns.name: ORGAN_SINGLE_SOURCE_DXO_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.
